page.title: 14Social Services : Willenhall
page.content: Social services helps people in many ways.It is made up of a committee drawn from the local council.Some of the services which they provide include Home Help to help the elderly and the disabled.Someone makes regular visits to homes to help with the cleaning,gardening or just to talk to the person.Sometimes they provide a Meals on Wheels service to provide a hot meal. Social Services also look after children who might have problems at home or who might have been to court.Some children might receive free school meals or help towards the cost of their uniform. Sometimes children might be taken into care and looked after by the Social Services.They also provide Homes where the elderly can be looked after.
